body:
Comment 12: 
When I looked at strace output, I used the attached dorun.go to get a simple strace.

$ 8g dorun.go
$ 8l -o dorun dorun.8

$ time ./dorun
Linux
real	0m0.014s
user	0m0.004s
sys	0m0.004s

$ time strace -tt -f -o strace.txt ./dorun /bin/uname
Linux
real	0m0.211s
user	0m0.020s
sys	0m0.028s
$
Attachments: 1. dorun.go (576 bytes) 1. strace.txt (7712 bytes)
